title.rendered: How does Coffee Effect the Body?

content.rendered:
How does Coffee Effect the Body?

THE good & the bad

EFFECTS OF COFFEE

In the US, coffee is more popular than soda, tea and juice combined, so scientists must know a few things for sure about exactly what coffee does for us 

Learn More!

THE GOOD!
Coffee can lower your risk of depression and suicide, and increase your levels of dopamine

Learn More!

THE GOOD!
Studies have shown that coffee reduces the risk of certain cancers, like endometrial cancer and some types of breast cancer!

Learn More!

THE GOOD!
Coffee drinkers are less likely to die from heart disease, respiratory disease, stroke, injuries and accidents.

Learn More!

THE GOOD!
The pièce de résistance: coffee can help you lose weight and stay fit!

Learn More!

THE BAD!
Your body quickly becomes dependent on the daily dose of caffeine.

Learn More!

THE BAD!
Caffeine interacts with some medications, including thyroid medication, psychiatric and depression drugs

Learn More!

THE BAD!
Caffeine can raising blood pressure, making arteries stiffer, and increasing levels of homocysteine, insulin, and possibly cholesterol

Learn More!

Bottom Line – All Good Things in Moderation
Swipe up to LEARN MORE!

Swipe Up!

excerpt.rendered: How does coffee effect the body? Learn the pros and the cons of coffee and learn if you should be drinking coffee every day. 1. Gives a Brain Boost 2. Lower Risk of Cancer 3. Add Years to Your Life
